doc:
Bobby Watson (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bobby_Watson_(actor) 0 Bobby Watson (November 28, 1888 – May 22, 1965), born Robert Watson Knucher, was an American theater and film actor, playing a variety of character roles, including, after 1942, Adolf Hitler. Bobby_Watson ( November_28_,_1888 – May_22_,_1965 ) , born Robert_Watson_Knucher , was an_American_theater_and_film_actor , playing a_variety of character_roles , including , after 1942 , Adolf_Hitler .
